title: What to expect as negotiations to end plastic pollution kick off - UNEP
body: According to one UNEP study, over 14 million metric tonnes of plastic enters and damages aquatic ecosystems annually, and greenhouse gas emissions associated with plastics are expected to account for 15 per cent of the total emissions allowable by 2050 if humanity is to limit global warming to 1.5°C.
readable_content: - The passage is clear, thank you!
summary:
The sentiment about banning plastic straws seems to be positive, as the text discusses the environmental benefits and alternatives to plastic straws. It showcases a concern for the environment and a desire to reduce plastic waste. 

Sentiment: 0.8
